_header: Te deum Laudamus To the Lord sovereign
_description: John Lydgate, a song of Thanksgiving, attributed to Lydgate — thirteen 8-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Te laudat omnis spiritus’

BLHar2255.First Lines:
Te deum laudamus to the lord sovereyneWe creaturys knowlech the as
                    creatoure…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…O sapiencia of whom al goodnesse sprongTe laudat omnis
                    spiritus
BLHar2255.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 21-4.
